page.title: 08Children's recreation
page.content: Matball is a very{popular game}in schools,such as morley place.Hand{ {ball}is like matball.Hide and seek is an old and popular game.Squint is a popular game in and out of school a lot of people can play it.This is played when{children}stand in a circle with open legs.One person bounces the ball in the centre.Whoever has the ball pass through their legs is 'on'.The ball is thrown at other childrens legs,when hit are also 'on'until the last child left is the winner.Tiggy is a game a lot of children can play it.There are a lot of different kinds of tiggy such as tiggy off the ground.Skipping is a well known game for boys and mainly girls.Pirates is a well known game that is still popular today.
